title: Catching stars of baseball
brief_description: An instructional film by four of America’s leading catchers in the major baseball leagues. Aimed at junoir baseballers where very few want to take a catcher’s job. Covers areas such as equipment required, stance, signals, throwing, catching, tactics and tagging.
